title: [Health] Many light smokers, those who smoke one to four cigarettes per day or fewer, meet the criteria for nicotine addiction and should be considered for treatment, researchers report. Lighter smoking is correctly perceived as less harmful than heavy smoking, but it still carries significant health risks.

[Neuroscience] People in rural areas less likely to receive specialty care for neurologic conditions. Neurologists in the United States are not evenly spread out, which affects whether patients can see a neurologist for certain conditions like dementia and stroke.
